page.title: 16TRANSPORT.
page.content: {TRANSPORT}RETFORD HAS EXCELLENT ROAD,RAIL AND CANAL LINKS.THE OLD {GREAT NORTH ROAD}RAN THROUGH THE CENTRE OF RETFORD AND THE WHITE HART HOTEL IN THE CENTRE OF THE TOWN WAS ONCE A COACHING INN.THE PRESENT{A1 RUNS JUST OUTSIDE THE TOWN. { RAIL}LINKS ARE PARTICULARLY GOOD. RETFORD STATION STANDS ON THE MAIN LONDON(KINGS CROSS) LINE AND THEREFORE BENEFITS FROM THE EXCELLENT TRAIN SERVICE. THE{CHESTERFIELD CANAL}RUNS THROUGH RETFORD AND IN THE PAST PROVIDED THE TOWN WITH IMPORTANT LINKS IN TRADE AND COMMERCE.
